title: UEFA European U21: Romania vs. Slovakia
description: This event is for the upcoming UEFA European Under-21 Championship match, scheduled for June 17, 2025 at 3:00 PM ET between Romania U21 and Slovakia U21.

markets.question: Will Romania U21 beat Slovakia U21?
markets.description:
In the upcoming UEFA European Under-21 game, scheduled for June 17 at 3:00 PM ET,
If Romania wins, this market will resolve to “Yes”.
Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve “No”.

markets.question: Will Slovakia U21 beat Romania U21?
markets.description:

markets.question: Will Romania U21 vs. Slovakia U21 end in a draw?
markets.description:
In the upcoming UEFA European Under-21 game, scheduled for June 17 at 3:00 PM ET,
If the game ends in a draw, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve to “Yes”.

title: Ethereum Up or Down - June 18, 12 AM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the ETH/USDT 1 Hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

title: Will OPEC cut production by next meeting?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if OPEC or OPEC+ officially announces a new group-level crude oil production cut that is additional to all production cuts publicly agreed to at or on the time the July 2025 OPEC+ meeting release is published. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The next OPEC+ meeting where production levels are to be set is scheduled to take place on July 6 (https://www.opec.org/pr-detail/1360566-31-may-2025.html). If that July 6, 2025 ET meeting passes, the release is published, and no rate cut occurs, this market will resolve to "No". If no release is published by the time of the next OPEC+ meeting, this market will resolve to "No".

A "new group-level crude oil production cut" means a reduction in crude oil production that is clearly presented as a new, collective action by OPEC or OPEC+ as a whole, not just an extension, reaffirmation, technical adjustment, or voluntary action by individual members or subgroups. Conditional cuts only count if the group explicitly agrees to reduce production and specifies the conditions and volume in the June 2025 announcement.
  
The primary resolution source will be official OPEC or OPEC+ communications, however a clear consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

title: Which NYC boroughs will Andrew Cuomo win in Democratic Primary?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Andrew Cuomo receives the most votes in the 2025 Democratic primary for Mayor of New York City in the listed borough. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

This market will resolve based on the official certified results of the final RCV round as published by the New York City Board of Elections.

If a recount is initiated prior to certification, the market will remain open until the recount is completed and results are certified. A recount initiated after certification will not affect market resolution.

title: 2025 Mid-Season Invitational
description:
This market will resolve according to the winner of the 2025 League of Legends Mid-Season Invitational (MSI).

If the tournament is postponed after July 28, 2025 (11:59 PM ET), canceled, or a winner has not been declared by that time, this market will resolve to “Other.”

If multiple teams are officially declared co-winners, this market will resolve in favor of the team whose listed team name comes first alphabetically.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from LoL Esports (https://lolesports.com/en-GB/tournament/113470835034591734/overview)

title: Trump invokes the Insurrection Act before August?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump officially invokes the Insurrection Act of 1807 by July 31, 2025 at 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, it will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, "invoke" means that the President formally announces the use of the Insurrection Act as legal authority for deploying active-duty U.S. military forces or federalizing the National Guard in response to civil disorder, insurrection, or rebellion.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

title: Solana Up or Down - June 17, 8AM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the SOL/USDT 1 Hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the SOL/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/SOL_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance SOL/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.
